There are two Survey of India 1: 50,000 toposheets with 15'x15' angular coverage, one from Jammu and another from Kerala. Which of the following statement is true?
options: Both the toposheets will cover exactly same size of area
The toposheet from Jammu will cover a large area than that of the Kerala
The toposheet from Kerala will cover a large area than that of the Jammu
Projection will affect the size of area coverage
correctAnswer: The toposheet from Kerala will cover a large area than that of the Jammu

A, B, C, E, O, R

correctAnswer: O, A, E, B, C, R

question: Who first used the term nanotechnology and when ?
What is graphene ?
options: a new material made from carbon nanotubes
a software tool made to measure and graphically represent nano particles
a one atom thick sheet of carbon
correctAnswer: a one atom thick sheet of carbon

question:
